rows.label: qst201702_0010
rows.name: Still not good enough, sirs...

rows.label: qst201702_0020
rows.name:
As soldiers of the Superbian Empire,
you must train yourselves more.

rows.label: qst201702_0030
rows.name:
...You are certainly strong.
I will acknowledge that.

rows.label: qst201702_0040
rows.name:
Perhaps even if all the soldiers here ganged
up on you, they would not be a match.

rows.label: qst201702_0050
rows.name: However!

rows.label: qst201702_0060
rows.name:
We soldiers of the Superbian Empire do
not only fight with our own bodies.

rows.label: qst201702_0070
rows.name:
The reason we are called the strongest army is
that we possess numerous Divine Beast weapons...

rows.label: qst201702_0080
rows.name:
...and each and every one of us
has the skill to master them.

rows.label: qst201702_0090
rows.name:
Oho... So it is the Divine Beast
weapons that make the Superbian army?

rows.label: qst201702_0100
rows.name:
Yes. Before a Divine Beast weapon,
even someone like you would...

rows.label: qst201702_0110
rows.name: I see.

rows.label: qst201702_0120
rows.name:
The Captain's words are
quite reasonable, sir.

rows.label: qst201702_0130
rows.name: Then, shall we try one thing out, sir?

rows.label: qst201702_0140
rows.name: Try?

rows.label: qst201702_0150
rows.name: Let us have a match with that.

rows.label: qst201702_0160
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst201702_0170
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst201702_0180
rows.name: Why are you so surprised, sirs?

rows.label: qst201702_0190
rows.name:
You can defeat me with a Divine
Beast weapon, can you not?

rows.label: qst201702_0200
rows.name:
Then I, Newt, shall
accept the challenge.

rows.label: qst201702_0210
rows.name:
No, no, no, no! That is a heavyweight
class Divine Beast weapon, you know!

rows.label: qst201702_0220
rows.name: There is no way a single Blade can win.

rows.label: qst201702_0230
rows.name: She's right, Newt. That's just reckless.

rows.label: qst201702_0240
rows.name:
Rex-dono, no need to worry,
sir. I am not that fragile.

rows.label: qst201702_0250
rows.name: But...

rows.label: qst201702_0260
rows.name:
Now, prepare yourselves quickly,
sirs. I am ready when you are, sir.

rows.label: qst201702_0270
rows.name:
...Are you serious? I will not be held
responsible if you are pulverized.

rows.label: qst201702_0280
rows.name:
I am the one saying it is fine, sir.
Now, give me your best shot, sirs!

rows.label: qst201702_0290
rows.name: ...Prepare to attack.

rows.label: qst201702_0300
rows.name: B-But, sir...

rows.label: qst201702_0310
rows.name: What is it, sir? Now, quickly.

rows.label: qst201702_0320
rows.name: D-Don't blame me for what happens...

rows.label: qst201702_0330
rows.name: Come!

rows.label: qst201702_0340
rows.name: How was that, sirs?

rows.label: qst201702_0350
rows.name:
Indeed, the Divine Beast weapons are the core
of the Superbian army. That is certain.

rows.label: qst201702_0360
rows.name:
However, relying solely on them
will never make you stronger.

rows.label: qst201702_0370
rows.name: What I felt when I fought you earlier...

rows.label: qst201702_0380
rows.name:
...is that you rely on your weapons
and neglect to train yourselves.

rows.label: qst201702_0390
rows.name:
To be called the strongest army,
you must strive for more, sirs.

rows.label: qst201702_0400
rows.name:
Indeed... It seems we need
to strive for more...

rows.label: qst201702_0410
rows.name: Grand Marshal.

rows.label: qst201702_0420
rows.name: G-Grand Marshal! Why are you here, sir?

rows.label: qst201702_0430
rows.name: Who's that?

rows.label: qst201702_0440
rows.name:
Excluding the Emperor's personal guard, he's the
second most important person in the Empire's army.

rows.label: qst201702_0450
rows.name:
A brawl within a base facility, and the unauthorized
use and destruction of a Divine Beast weapon.

rows.label: qst201702_0460
rows.name: Each of these is a serious crime.

rows.label: qst201702_0470
rows.name: I-I am deeply sorry, sir!

rows.label: qst201702_0480
rows.name: We are deeply sorry, sir!

rows.label: qst201702_0490
rows.name: Grand Marshal, if I may?

rows.label: qst201702_0500
rows.name:
This was our oversight.
They are not to blame...

rows.label: qst201702_0510
rows.name: The responsibility is all mine.

rows.label: qst201702_0520
rows.name: Meleph-dono...

rows.label: qst201702_0530
rows.name:
No... It seems you are accompanied
by a rather interesting Blade.

rows.label: qst201702_0540
rows.name:
Your respect for your Blade's will...
is the mark of a true Driver.

rows.label: qst201702_0550
rows.name: You are too kind, sir...

rows.label: qst201702_0560
rows.name:
But a violation is a violation.
I cannot overlook this.

rows.label: qst201702_0570
rows.name: As Grand Marshal, I command you.

rows.label: qst201702_0580
rows.name:
Immediately repair the Divine Beast weapon
Tortoga and return it to operational status.

rows.label: qst201702_0590
rows.name: This is a top-priority mission.

rows.label: qst201702_0600
rows.name:
Grand Marshal, sir! Permission
to make a suggestion, sir!

rows.label: qst201702_0610
rows.name: ...What is it?

rows.label: qst201702_0620
rows.name:
This entire incident was caused
by my own incompetence, sir.

rows.label: qst201702_0630
rows.name:
Therefore, I would like to
undertake this mission by myself.

rows.label: qst201702_0640
rows.name: Oh? Is that acceptable, Meleph-dono?

rows.label: qst201702_0650
rows.name:
If the Grand Marshal permits...
we will also provide assistance.

rows.label: qst201702_0660
rows.name: ...Understood. Then, repeat your orders.

rows.label: qst201702_0670
rows.name: Sir!

rows.label: qst201702_0680
rows.name:
I will now undertake the mission to repair
the Divine Beast weapon Tortoga, sir!

rows.label: qst201702_0690
rows.name: Dismissed!
